TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void LoadedEventHandler(object sender, LoadedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed LoadedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub LoadedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As LoadedEventArgs)
public delegate void LoadedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, LoadedEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示将处理 类的 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你创建委托时，标识要处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify a method to handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
